price: Those who do not expect to meet Us, and are pleased and content with the life of this world[12], and those who are heedless of Our signs,
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا وَرَضُواْ بِٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱطۡمَأَنُّواْ بِهَا وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا غَٰفِلُونَ
footnotes: [12] They do not give a second’s thought to resurrection and reckoning; their current life is all that matters to them.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna lā yarjūna liqāanā waraḍū bil-ḥayati al-dun'yā wa-iṭ'ma-annū bihā wa-alladhīna hum ʿan āyātinā ghāfilūna
